attributes.action: Add Addictiveness warning labels to Caffeine Products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Caffeine is a highly addictive substance, but consumers are not warned of the dangers prior to consuming.  These include young children.  I believe that these children are being 'hooked' in from any early age and kept hooked for life.  Warnings need to be made clear and these products should carry them responsibly.
